K10ayuhparu:0: Āps 1. bhagavāṃc chrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma. icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ satvānām (GBM 1707.1)
K10ayuhparu:3: yad bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ satvānām āyuḥparyantaṃ deśayed. bhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavo dhārayiṣyanti. tena hi bhikṣavaḥ (GBM 1707.2)
K10ayuhparu:4: śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta,
K10ayuhparu:5: bhāṣiṣya. evaṃ bhadanteti. te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣuḥ. atha bhagavāṃs tān bhikṣūn idam avocat*.
K10ayuhparu:6: Āps 2. paraṃ bhikṣavo narakeṣu kalpa āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1707.3)
K10ayuhparu:8: Āps 3. paraṃ bhikṣavas tiryakṣu kalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:10: Āps 4. yāni bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ triṃśad rātriṃdivasāni tat pretānām (GBM 1707.4)
K10ayuhparu:14: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā paṃca varṣaśatāni pretānām āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1707.5)
K10ayuhparu:15: pramāṇāṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā paṃcadaśa varṣasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:17: Āps 5. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.

K10ayuhparu:90: Āps 12. jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇām utkarṣāpakarṣaṃ prajñāyate. jāmbudvīpakā bhikṣavo manuṣyā amitāyuṣo 'pi,
K10ayuhparu:94: Āps 13. etarhi bhikṣavo jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśatam āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. etarhi bhikṣavo jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ (GBM 1705.6)
K10ayuhparu:95: yaś ciraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśataṃ kiṃcid vā bhūyaḥ samyaksukhena parihṛyamāṇaḥ.
K10ayuhparu:96: Āps 14. varṣaśataṃ khalu bhikṣavo jīvaṃ daśāvasthāḥ pratyanubhavati. prathamāyām avasthāyāṃ (GBM 1705.7)
K10ayuhparu:97: bālo bhavati manda uttānaśāyī. dvitīyāyām avasthāyāṃ kumāro bhavati krīḍanajātīyaḥ. tṛtīyāyām avasthāyāṃ yuvā bhavati kāmabhogī. caturthyām avasthāyāṃ (GBM 1704.1)
K10ayuhparu:98: balavān bhavati utsāhī. paṃcamyām avasthāyāṃ prajño bhavati pratibhānavān*. ṣaṣṭhyām
K10ayuhparu:99: avasthāyāṃ smṛtimān bhavati mīmāṃsanajātīyaḥ. saptamyām avasthāyāṃ sthito bhavati manā (GBM 1704.2)
K10ayuhparu:100: + + prāptaḥ. aṣṭhamyām avasthāyāṃ sthaviro bhavati rājanyaḥ. navamyām avasthāyāṃ
K10ayuhparu:101: vṛddho bhavati jarājīrṇaḥ. daśamyām avasthāyāṃ gatāyur bhavati maraṇaparāyaṇaḥ. varṣaśataṃ (GBM 1704.3)
K10ayuhparu:102: khalu bhikṣavo jīvam iha daśāvasthāḥ pratyanubhavati.
K10ayuhparu:103: Āps 15. varṣaśataṃ khalu bhikṣavo jīvan trīṇi ṛtuśatāni jīvati,
K10ayuhparu:106: ṛtuśataṃ varṣāṇām*. trīṇi ṛtuśatāni jīvan dvādaśa māsaśatāni jīvati,
K10ayuhparu:113: aṣṭau varṣāṇām*. caturviṃśatim ardhamāsaśatāni jīvaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ rātriṃdivasasahasrāṇi (GBM 1704.6)
K10ayuhparu:117: Āps 16. ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ rātriṃdivasasahasrāṇi jīvan dvāsaptatiṃ bhaktasahasrāṇi bhuṃkte sārdhaṃ (GBM 1704.7)
K10ayuhparu:128: iti yaś ca bhuṃkte yaś ca na bhuṃkte tad aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya dvāsaptatir bhaktasahasrāṇi bhavanti (GBM 1702.2)
K10ayuhparu:130: Āps 17. iti hi bhikṣavo mayā jāmbūdvīpakāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇām āyur apy ākhyātam,
K10ayuhparu:137: Āps 18. yāni bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ paṃcāśad varṣāṇi tac cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:140: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā divyāni paṃca varṣaśatāni cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. (GBM 1702.5)
K10ayuhparu:141: tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā navati varṣaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:143: Āps 19. tad bhavati saṃjīve mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ, (GBM 1702.6)
K10ayuhparu:146: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā paṃca varṣaśatāni saṃjīve mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ (GBM 1702.7)
K10ayuhparu:147: satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati māṇuṣikayā gaṇanayā. ekaṃ varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ dvāṣaṣṭīṇi ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:149: Āps 20. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.
K10ayuhparu:151: X X X X ^ _ _ X X X X X ^ _ ^ X // 28
K10ayuhparu:158: manuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśataṃ tad devāṇāṃ trayastriṃśānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:162: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ devānām trayastriṃśānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā tisro varṣakoṭyaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy (GBM 1703.5)
K10ayuhparu:165: Āps 22. tad bhavati kālasūtre mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:168: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā varṣasahasraṃ kālasūtre mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā (GBM 1703.7)
K10ayuhparu:169: gaṇanayā dvādaśa varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi ṣaṇnavatiś ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:173: mātāpitṛṣu ye drugdhā buddheṣu śrāvakeṣu ca /
K10ayuhparu:178: kālasūtraṃ prapannās te narakaṃ tena karmaṇā // 32
K10ayuhparu:179: Āps 24. yad bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ dve varṣaśate tad yamānāṃ devāṇām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:183: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā divye dve varṣasahasre yamānāṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā (GBM 1694.4)
K10ayuhparu:184: gaṇanayā caturdaśa varṣakoṭyaḥ catvāriṃśac ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:186: Āps 25. tad bhavati saṃghāte mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ, (GBM 1694.5)
K10ayuhparu:189: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā dve varṣasahasre saṃghāte mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ (GBM 1694.6)
K10ayuhparu:190: satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā ekavarṣakoṭīṇāṃ koṭiḥ triṇī ca varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi aṣṭāṣaṣṭīṇi ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1694.7)
K10ayuhparu:192: Āps 26. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate.
K10ayuhparu:193: trividham akuśalaṃ kṛtvā akṛta X ^ X ^ X /
K10ayuhparu:197: Āps 27. yāni bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ catvāri varṣaśatāni tāni tuṣitānāṃ devānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ (GBM 1695.2)
K10ayuhparu:200: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā divyāni catvāri varṣasahasrāṇi tuṣitānāṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1695.3)
K10ayuhparu:201: pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā saptapaṃcāśad varṣakoṭyaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:208: mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā aṣṭau varṣakoṭīnayutāny ekonatriṃśac ca varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi (GBM 1695.6)
K10ayuhparu:211: Āps 29. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate.
K10ayuhparu:216: na datto bhairavaṃ nādaṃ tūṭakā vaṭikā narāḥ // 36
K10ayuhparu:218: varṣaśatāni tāni nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:222: nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā triṃśad uttare dve varṣakoṭiśate catvāriṃśac ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, (GBM 1696.3)
K10ayuhparu:224: Āps 31. tad bhavati mahāraurave mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:227: saṃvatsaragaṇanayā aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi mahāraurave mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā ṣaṭṣaṣṭi varṣakoṭīkoṭyaḥ (GBM 1696.5)
K10ayuhparu:228: paṃcatriṃśac ca varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi dvāpaṃcāśac ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:230: Āps 32. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.
K10ayuhparu:237: viceṣṭhyamānā khādyante X X X X ^ _ ^ X // 39
K10ayuhparu:239: varṣaśatāni tat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:244: paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā ekaviṃśati varṣakoṭi nava ca varṣakoṭiśatāni ṣaṣtiś ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy (GBM 1697.3)
K10ayuhparu:247: Āps 34. tad bhavati tapane mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:251: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā ṣaḍaśa varṣasahasrāṇi tapane mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā (GBM 1697.5)
K10ayuhparu:252: gaṇanayā paṃca varṣakoṭīkoṭiśatāni triṃśac ca varṣakoṭikoṭyaś caturaśītiś ca varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi ṣoḍaśa ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, (GBM 1697.6)
K10ayuhparu:254: Āps 35. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate.
K10ayuhparu:255: śramaṇān brāhmaṇān sādhūn mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā /
K10ayuhparu:256: santāpayati yo śiṣṭais tapane sa prapadyate // 40

K10ayuhparu:259: Āps 36. icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ arbudopapannānāṃ satvānām āyuḥparyantaṃ śrotuṃ. etasya (GBM 1698.1)
K10ayuhparu:262: yad bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ arbudopapannānāṃ satvānām āyuḥparyantaṃ deśayed. bhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavo dhārayiṣyanti. tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuvantu (GBM 1698.2)
K10ayuhparu:263: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye.
K10ayuhparu:264: Āps 37. tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ iha syād viṃśatikhārīkaḥ kosalakas tilavāhaḥ pūrṇas tilānāṃ sacūḍikābaddhaḥ. tataḥ kaścid eva puruṣo (GBM 1698.3)
K10ayuhparu:265: varṣaśatasya varṣaśatasyātyayād ekaikaṃ tilam apanayet*. kṣiprataraṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ saviṃśatikhārīkaḥ kosalakas tilavāhaḥ anenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ (GBM 1698.4)
K10ayuhparu:267: na tv evāhaṃ arbudopapannānāṃ satvānām āyuḥparyantaṃ vadāmi.
K10ayuhparu:268: Āps 38. yathā viṃśatir arbudāny evam ekaṃ nirarbudaṃ. yathā viṃśatir nirarbudāny (GBM 1698.5)
K10ayuhparu:269: evam ekam aṭaṭaṃ. yathā viṃśatir aṭaṭāny evam ekaṃ hahavaṃ. yathā viṃśatir hahavāny evam ekaṃ huhuvaṃ. yathā viṃśatir huhuvāny evam ekam utpalaṃ. (GBM 1698.6)
K10ayuhparu:270: yathā viṃśatir utpalāny evam ekaṃ padmaṃ. yathā viṃśatiḥ padmāny evam ekaṃ mahāpadmaṃ,
K10ayuhparu:271: yatra kokāliko bhikṣavo devadattapakṣaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣor (GBM 1698.7)
K10ayuhparu:272: antike cittaṃ pradūṣya svaśarīreṇaiva mahāpadme mahānarake upapannaḥ.
K10ayuhparu:273: Āps 39. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavya + + + + + + + + pi cittam apradūṣayi (GBM 1699.1)
K10ayuhparu:274: + + ḥ prāg eva savijñānake + + ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavo śikṣitavyaṃ.
K10ayuhparu:275: Āps 40. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.//
K10ayuhparu:278: puruṣasya hi jātasya kuṭḥārī jāyate mukhe /
K10ayuhparu:281: yo nindyajanaṃ praśaṃsati praśaṃsyaṃ ca janaṃ vinindati /
K10ayuhparu:282: sa cinoti mukhena taṃ kaliṃ kalinā yena sukhaṃ na vindati // 43

K10ayuhparu:284: ayam atra mahattaraḥ kalir yaḥ sugateṣu manaḥ pradūṣyet* // 44

K10ayuhparu:294: Āps 42. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate.
K10ayuhparu:298: śramaṇān brāhmaṇān sādhūn mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā /
K10ayuhparu:299: hanti yaś ca gurūn anyān pacyate sa pratāpane (GBM 1699.7) // 48
K10ayuhparu:300: Āps. 43. avīcau khalu bhikṣavo mahānarake kalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:301: asty antareṇa kālakriyā. yatra devadatto mohapuruṣaḥ samagraṃ saṃghaṃ bhitvā tathāgatasyāntike (GBM 1701.1)
K10ayuhparu:302: duṣṭacitto rudhiram utpādayitvā bhikṣuṇīṃ vārhantīṃ ghātayitvā svaśarīreṇaiva avīcau mahānarake upapannaḥ.
K10ayuhparu:303: Āps 42. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.
K10ayuhparu:306: phalaṃ kaṇṭakaveṇur vā phalaty ātmavadhāya saḥ // 49
K10ayuhparu:307: kalyāṇikām eva muñcen na tu muñceta (GBM 1701.3) pāpikāṃ /
K10ayuhparu:308: muktvā kalyāṇikāṃ śreyo muktvā tapati pāpikān* // 50
K10ayuhparu:309: saced muñcet pratimuñced muñcamāno hi vadhyate /
K10ayuhparu:310: na tām āryā vimuñcanti bālā muñcanti pāpikān* // 51
K10ayuhparu:311: adhī (GBM 1701.4) X X ^ kṛtveha karma durgatigāmikaḥ /
K10ayuhparu:313: Āps 45. brahmakāyikānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām ardhakalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, (GBM 1701.5)
K10ayuhparu:315: Āps 46. brahmapurohitānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ kalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:321: Āps 48. parīttābhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dvau kalpāv āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam. asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
K10ayuhparu:325: Āps 50. ābhāsvarāṇāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aṣṭau kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:328: bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣoḍaśa kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:330: Āps 52. apraṃāṇaśubhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dvātriṃśat kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:332: Āps 53. (GBM 1700.2) śubhakṛtsnānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:334: Āps 54. anabhrakāṇāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ paṃcaviṃśaty adhikaṃ kalpaśatam āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, asty (GBM 1700.3)
K10ayuhparu:336: Āps 55. puṇyaprasavānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām ardhatritīyāni kalpaśatāny āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:341: Āps 57. tathaivāsaṃjñāsatvānāṃ paṃca kalpaśatāny āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:346: Āps 59. atapānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dve kalpasahasre āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:348: Āps 60. sudṛśānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catvāri kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:350: Āps 61. sudarśanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1700.7)
K10ayuhparu:352: Āps 62. akaniṣṭhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣoḍaśa kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:354: Āps 63. ākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ viṃśatiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:356: Āps 64. vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catvāriṃśat kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:358: Āps 65. ākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣaṣṭiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
K10ayuhparu:360: Āps 66. naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
